get.description: Perform an exact-match-only lookup across structured metadata fields.

post.summary: Validate single speaker audio and create voice profile
post.description:
Validates uploaded audio for single speaker and creates a voice profile.

    **Validation Requirements:**
    - Audio must contain exactly one speaker (not more, not less)
    - Audio duration must be at least 20 seconds
    - Confidence score must be at least 75%

    **Returns:**
    - success: Boolean indicating if validation passed
    - confidence_score: Overall diarization confidence (0.0 to 1.0)
    - duration_seconds: Audio duration in seconds
    - voiceprint_created: Whether voiceprint was created and saved to Firestore
    - message: Detailed validation result message

HandleMemoryEventQdrantRequest.title: HandleMemoryEventQdrantRequest
HandleMemoryEventQdrantRequest.description:
Payload for processing memory events for Qdrant embedding.

    Example:
    {
        "event_type": "create",
        "user_id": "LLKiXrBgXhUm5H6LiV11",
        "memory_id": "GcwhlTvjgDFNghbrHmLf",
        "duration": 132.7,
        "timestamp": "2025-05-13T20:59:51.799000Z",
        "participants": [{"name": "Alex"}, {"name": "Priya"}],
        "mom": "# Key Takeaways

Meeting discussed..."
        "entities": ["Alex", "Priya", "Meeting", "Discussion"],
        "tags": ["Meeting", "Discussion", "Alex", "Priya"],
    }
